timeline.message: Fix(Custom Functions): Begin moving custom fuction actions and controllers to more logical packages within web
Fix(Custom Functions): Move provider and channel custom functions to their logical locations
Fix(SAML Custom Fuction): Move SAML custom function to logical location

timeline.bodyText: why the use of final here?
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: Intellij must have added it. Good catch, I'll look into it.
replies.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: Looks like it's because the only operations on columns are additive.
replies.author: gkillough
